CustomField.description: Numeric value of Nurse Recommendation When. Used to compare against System When.
CustomField.formula: CASE( VCC_Logistical_Recommendation_WHEN__c , '911', 8, 'Now',7 , 'Within 8 Hours',6, 'Within 24 Hours',5, 'Within 3 Days',4, 'Within 2 Weeks',3, 'Selfcare',2,1)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Numeric value of Nurse Recommendation When.
CustomField.label: Nurse When Value
